metadata.title: CVE-2022-48708 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  pinctrl: single: fix potential NULL dereference  Added checking of pointer "function" in pcs_set_mux(). pinmux_generic_get_function() can return NULL and the pointer "function" was dereferenced without checking against NULL.  Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.
